    • Field Detail

      • socket

        private java.net.DatagramSocket socket

      • address

        private java.net.InetAddress address

      • logger

        private java.util.logging.Logger logger

      • port

        private int port

      • verifiedByMe

        private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> verifiedByMe
        List of UUIDs of verified packets that have already been handled. When we get a packet with a UUID in this list, we do not call the parse(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object>, java.net.DatagramPacket) handler and simply send the confirm message.

      • pendingPackets

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​VerifyPacket> pendingPackets
        Active VerifyPackets that need to be updated.

      • clients

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​UDPClientHandler> clients
        List of active clients.

      • serialTable

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> serialTable
        Table used to serialize actions. See NetUtils.serialize()

      • deserialTable

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> deserialTable
        A reversed copy of the serialTable (values are keys and keys are values). Therefore, the serial table must not contain any duplicate values for this to work properly. Used for deserialization of actions.

      • clientLimit

        private int clientLimit
        How many clients can connect to the server at one time before we start kicking them.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UDPServer

        public UDPServer​(java.lang.String host,
                 int listenPort,
                 int maxClients)
          throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                 java.net.SocketException
        Create a new UDP server at the specified address
        Parameters:
        host - Host to bind to
        listenPort - port to bind to
        maxClients - Maximum number of clients
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Invalid hostname
        java.net.SocketException - Error opening DatagramSocket
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Invalid actionID

    • Method Detail

      • getActionTable

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getActionTable()
        Used in constructor to determine action table. Action tables are used to serialize actions. See NetUtils.serialize()
        Returns:
        Table

      • send

        public void send​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> datagram,
                 java.net.InetAddress datAddress,
                 int datPort)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Send message
        Parameters:
        datagram - Message to send
        datAddress - Host to send to
        datPort - Port to send to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Sending message over connection may fail.

      • sendToAll

        public void sendToAll​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> datagram)
        Send the packet to all clients in client list.
        Parameters:
        datagram - Packet to send

      • parse

        public void parse​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> datagram,
                  java.net.DatagramPacket packet)
        Event handler for all messages sent here.
        Parameters:
        datagram - Message
        packet - raw packet

      • update

        public void update()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Accept new messages and add the address to our client list if the address is unkown and we have not exceeded the clientLimit. Also handle verifySends and shutdown events. Forward others to the parse(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object>, java.net.DatagramPacket) handler.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Connection may fail

      • onClientShutdown

        public void onClientShutdown​(java.net.DatagramPacket packet)
        Event Handler for clientShutdown. Removes the address from our list of clients.
        Parameters:
        packet - Shutdown packet (the packet the client sent declaring the shutdown event)

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Calls all clients' UDPClientHandler.shutdown(). Stops all pendingPackets

      • addVerifyPacket

        public void addVerifyPacket​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> datagram,
                            int frequency,
                            double backoff,
                            java.net.InetAddress host,
                            int port)
        Add a VerifyPacket to pendingPackets. (In other words, send the packet, and make sure it arrives!) See VerifyPacket
        Parameters:
        datagram - Packet
        frequency - Initial delay
        backoff - exponential backoff
        host - host to send to
        port - port to send to
